job_history.work_description: Help prepare Financial Statements and Bank Reconciliations. Perform accounts payable functions for governmental expenses. Manage vendor accounts and prepare 1099s for contract labor. Prepare, Record Journal Entries, & Reconcile Asset accounts, including surplus, depreciation expense, and the purchase, & addition of new assets. Organize new asset tagging & yearly department assets counts. Organize and carry out efficient month-end, quarterly and year-end processes. Record journal entries and perform accounting on accrual basis for year end procedures.

Preparation and Analysis of Hospital Financial Statements. Investigate and resolve discrepancies in financial statements while under tight deadlines. Compile general ledger entries on short time schedule with nearly 100% accuracy. Analyze monthly balance sheet accounts & Â record journal entries for corporate reporting.

Prepare & File tax returns for individual, partnership, corporate, and tax exempt clients. Prepare LLC & Corporate monthly payroll & Quarterly Reports. Generate financial statements and facilitate account closing procedures each month.

Prepare individual, partnership, corporate & fiduciary tax returns. Audit governmental, for-profit and not for profit entities. Uphold strict confidentiality protocols with all client details and tax return information.

skills.name: Financial Statement Preparation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in preparing financial statements for various clients, including hospitals and governmental entities, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Bank Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Consistently performed bank reconciliations for multiple clients, suggesting strong proficiency in this area.

skills.name: Accounts Payable
skills.explanation: Handled accounts payable functions for governmental expenses, indicating a strong proficiency in this area.

skills.name: Asset Management
skills.explanation: Managed asset accounts, including surplus, depreciation expense, and the purchase and addition of new assets, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Journal Entries
skills.explanation: Frequently prepared and recorded journal entries for various clients, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Tax Preparation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in preparing tax returns for individual, partnership, corporate, and tax-exempt clients, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Prepared monthly payroll and quarterly reports for clients, showing a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed monthly balance sheet accounts and financial statements for clients, suggesting strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Conducted audits for governmental, for-profit, and not-for-profit entities, indicating strong proficiency in auditing.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in accounting, including financial statement preparation, tax preparation, and auditing, indicating expert-level mastery.
